import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import service from '../../config/axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function CategoryProduct() { const categoria = useParams().category const [categoryDetail, setCategoryDetail] = useState() useEffect(async() => { const respuesta = await service.get(`http://localhost:3001/product/category/${categoria}`) setCategoryDetail(respuesta.data) }, []) return ( <> { categoryDetail === undefined?():( categoryDetail.map((e,id)=>{ return( <>
  • {/* */}

    {e.name}

    ${e.price}

    {e.material}

) }) ) } ) }
